subject: Suits and Litigation
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: A former athletic compliance officer who claims Marshall University used him as a scapegoat said he has settled a lawsuit against the university and several officials for an undisclosed amount. The lawsuit filed by David Ridpath was scheduled to go to trial this week before United States District Judge Chuck Chambers in Huntington, W.Va. But lawyers notified the court of the pending settlement.
